ENTITY C2_T5_Binary_to_One_Hot_Converter IS
   PORT(
      binary_in   : IN     std_logic_vector (2 DOWNTO 0);
      one_hot_out : OUT    std_logic_vector (7 DOWNTO 0)
   );

-- Declarations

END C2_T5_Binary_to_One_Hot_Converter ;
